byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED and BEN PROTESS

abstract: Shares of MF Global were halted for trading early on Monday, as the brokerage prepared to file for bankruptcy protection and sell some of its assets to the Interactive Brokers Group, according to people briefed on the matter.
snippet: Shares of MF Global were halted for trading early on Monday, as the brokerage prepared to file for bankruptcy protection and sell some of its assets to the Interactive Brokers Group, according to people briefed on the matter.
lead_paragraph: 7:51 a.m. | Updated Shares in MF Global Holdings were halted for trading early on Monday, as the brokerage prepared to file for bankruptcy protection and sell some of its assets to the Interactive Brokers Group, according to people briefed on the matter.

headline.main: MF Global Said to Be in Deal Talks With Interactive Brokers
